inclusion.criterion: pregnant or post partum woman with systolic blood pressure ≥160mm of Hg or diastolic BP ≥110 mm Hg
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: enrolled after informed consent and randomly allocated to each treatment arm by 1:1 randomization through simple random allocation
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has severe hypertension, but no history of recurrent UTI or underlying disease. Blood culture is negative.
